nHDeabsorbÔÉÅ

nHDeabsorb is designed for use with XSpec-produced X-ray spectra in order to determine the intrinsic X-ray emission by nH-deabsorbing spectra. This is required for blazar SED modeling codes such as Bjet_MCMC which model the intrinsic (not observed) emission.
